Class BoardGame

java.lang.Object
model.entity.BoardGame
public class BoardGame extends Object
The BoardGame class represents a board game with a board, players, and dice. It allows for the creation of different gametypes (e.g., Snakes and Ladders, Quiz), adding players, rolling dice, and checking for a winner.
